rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: CMSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: CMGRPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Example: a line identifier or record identifier defined in the sponsor's operational database.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: CMSPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMTRT

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim medication name as recorded.

datasetVariables.name: CMTRT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of medications/treatment. Examples: "PRIOR", "CONCOMITANT", "ANTI-DIARRHEA MEDICATION", "GENERAL CONMED".
datasetVariables.label: Category for Medication
datasetVariables.name: CMCAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of medications/treatment. Examples: "ANALGESIC", "TOPICAL ANTIMICROBIAL", "ANTIHISTAMINE".
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Medication
datasetVariables.name: CMSCAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMINDC

datasetVariables.description: Denotes why a medication was administered. Examples: "DIARRHEA", "SUPERFICIAL WOUND".
datasetVariables.label: Indication
datasetVariables.name: CMINDC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSE

datasetVariables.description: Amount of CMTRT administered. Not populated when CMDOSTXT is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose per Administration
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSE

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSTXT

datasetVariables.description: Dosing amounts or a range of dosing information collected in text form. Units may be stored in CMDOSU. Examples: "200-400", "15-20". Not populated when CMDOSE is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose Description
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSTXT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Units for CMDOSE, CMDOSTOT, or CMDOSTXT. Examples: "ng", "mg", or "mg/kg".
datasetVariables.label: Dose Units
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66726

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSFRM

datasetVariables.description: Dose form for CMTRT. Examples: "TABLET", "LOTION".
datasetVariables.label: Dose Form
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSFRM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71113

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSFRQ

datasetVariables.description: Usually expressed as the number of repeated administrations of CMDOSE within a specific time period. Examples: "BID" (twice daily), "Q12H" (every 12 hours).
datasetVariables.label: Dosing Frequency per Interval
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSFRQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSTOT

datasetVariables.description: Total daily dose of CMTRT using the units in CMDOSU. Used when dosing is collected as Total Daily Dose. Total dose over a period other than day could be recorded in a separate Supplemental Qualifier variable.
datasetVariables.label: Total Daily Dose
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSTOT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable CM.CMDOSRGM

datasetVariables.description: Text description of the (intended) schedule or regimen for the intervention. Example: "TWO WEEKS ON, TWO WEEKS OFF".
datasetVariables.label: Intended Dose Regimen
datasetVariables.name: CMDOSRGM

datasetVariables.description: Route of administration for the intervention. Examples: "ORAL", "INTRAVENOUS".
